reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan chic and versatile, noting it can be dressed up or down, and one customer mentions it can be worn with jeans and skirts both opened and closed. The sweater receives positive feedback for its quality, fabric, fit, and color, with customers appreciating how it can be worn as a jacket. While some customers consider it well worth the price, others find it expensive, and opinions about sizing a

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Head-turner!!
items.body: If you're looking to turn heads (in a good way), your closet needs this. It's such a trendy spin on a cardigan that can be worn by itself (my preference) or layer with something underneath. It's very true to size and heavy (good quality) fabric. Be careful when washing it to use cold water and lay flat to dry to make sure it maintains its structure. I chose the brown color to stand out vs the black. I will be purchasing more colors, possibly the green one as the colors are very rich. Read more
items.author: Opalescent

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like high end designer
items.body: Love love love! The gold closures and sweater itself are unique and look â€œdesignerâ€ . Best sweater purchase ever! I am 5â€9 and rather lanky but hippy. This sweater totally balances out my figure. And shockingly it fits my extra long arms perfectly. I immediately ordered in black. The price is actually good for the high quality product Read more
items.author: Juliet

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and great item
items.body: Super cool and fashionable! True to size. The fabric is of great quality, not warm, and the color is just as beautiful as it looks in the photo. Size up if you want a comfortable fit Ok for the money Read more
items.author: Adolfo Fermo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic and Stylish
items.body: This cardigan is a beauty! Fit is flattering, great quality and ultra chic. Versatile, from jeans to tuxedo pants. Sizing isn't completely accurate-I'm about 5'7 size 14/16 I purchased in size 3XL (I normally wear XL) so go by their size chart. Bodice fits well but sleeves were a bit long but I actually like it that way. This was a good purchase and I'd buy from them again. Read more
items.author: Niche7

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars well worth it!
items.body: this shirt is stunning!! very unique with good quality fabric. is does run small so size up. I normally wear medium/large but sized up based on other reviews. my only issue in wearing is the bottom came undone so you may want to secure with a safety pin Read more
items.author: LaTanya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique Design and Great Quality
items.body: This sweater is a unique design with great quality that always catches the eye. It should be the outermost layer as the sleeves do not fit well in a traditional coat. I usually wear a large in Urban Revivo, but since it was knit the Medium also works for me. I truly love it and bought many colors ðŸ˜ Read more
items.author: Tammi N. Moore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Absolutely beautiful! Great style and knit material is quality. Read more
items.author: Mechelle Taylor-Mercer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate your wardrobe!
items.body: I can't tell you enough to buy this sweater!!! It's literally fabulous! I've been wanting to elevate my wardrobe and this piece is iconic!! I purchase the olive green in a 3x. I normally wear 2x in tops. Sizing up is definitely the way to go..it's snug in all the right places. I'm going to purchase more because this sweater is everything!! Read more
items.author: Tarika

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, White, Blue, Olive Green, Apricot, Black-02, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
